snippet.title: Hotshot Racing | Official Reveal Trailer | Curve Digital
snippet.description:
Hotshot Racing is a blisteringly fast arcade-style racing game from Curve Digital, Lucky Mountain Games and Sumo Digital. Fusing drift handling, razor-sharp retro visuals and an incredible sense of speed to create an exhilarating driving experience. Perfect your racing apex at a blistering 60FPS in single-player mode to then challenge your friends and the racing community in 8-player online races and 4-player local split-screen multiplayer modes.

Wishlist on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/609920/Hotshot_Racing/
